Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Kilbourn
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th & Midway Orange Line Terminal, due to street blockage near 63rd/Kilbourn

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Pulaski, 59th and Midway Orange Line, Terminal then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near 63rd/Kilbourn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th- bound Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: 95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to police activity.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
